name: wpcradletheme
description: A WordPress barebone starter theme. Easy Peasy.
author: Picapoint

scripts.buildcss: node-sass --output-style compressed --sourceMap true --quiet assets/styles/scss/style.scss assets/styles/styles.min.css & node-sass --output-style compressed --sourceMap true --quiet assets/styles/scss/login.scss assets/styles/login.min.css && run-s autoprefixer
scripts.buildjs: jshint assets/scripts/js && browserify assets/scripts/js/main.js > assets/scripts/scripts.js && uglifyjs assets/scripts/scripts.js --compress --output assets/scripts/scripts.min.js
